content:
Currently, users can edit topic names even if they aren't allowed to post on a stream. As @Alex Vandiver pointed in out in #21281:

We should further consider if we want to limit topic renames to people who can post.

Prohibiting topic editing on streams where the user doesn't have posting permissions makes sense to me. What do folks think?
Yeah, I think that's pretty clearly the expected model for now. In the future, I expect these will be independent permissions in the Groups UI.
